thread.section_title: Simply Hike Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Simply Hike | www.simplyhike.co.uk
thread.title: Will Plummer
thread.title_full: Simply Hike reviewed by Will Plummer

author: Will Plummer
title: Will Plummer
text:
After Go Outdoors let me down with deceitful offers and bogus discounts I started looking around for an alternative. This shop is fantastic. Actual genuine sales/discounts, not artificially marked up prices on "sale".
My order was promptly processed and dispatched. I will be getting my outdoor gear from them in the future. Very pleased.
